item.description:
This month, we'll converge on the 6th Annual Sustainable Living Festival Expo in Hull MA
Sponsored by Sustainable South Shore.

The Expo runs from 10AM-2PM. See the above link for more details.

I think you'll be particularly interested in the Hull Wind I Wind Turbine Tours: every 15 minutes, 11 a.m. to 1 p.m.

I myself am too ill to go today (so disappointed!), but I propose that you meet at 1:30 at Jake's Seafood, right across the street from Hull's famous wooden carousel carousel built in 1928.

Cheers,
- Josh
item.how_to_find_us: I'm too ill to join you today. Please look for each other by your pictures --->
item.name: April '09 Alt Energy Meetup at the South Shore Sustainable Living Festival Expo
